about_the_game:
The demo version is the prologue and the first chapter of the full game.

The Witch in The Woods is a light yuri visual novel with multiple endings set in a fantasy world. Monster encounters, mysteries, secrets, betrayal, love and tenderness can all be found in this game.

Story:



No one dares to go into the perilous Greywind Forest. According to legend, there are beings outside the norms and more dangerous than wild beasts. Once inside, there is no getting out.

A wicked family of witches is rumored to reside in the depths of this woodland, using the blood of young girls as a source of material for black magic.

The witch family is allegedly no longer in Greywind Forest, but one of the witches has just made a comeback.

Nellie enters the Greywind Forest for her own reasons and encounters the stunning but dangerous witch there. What fate awaits her?


Features:



A touching story in a mysterious fantasy setting.
Monsters and adventures to encounter, secrets to be discovered.
20+ CGs.
Story branching and multiple endings.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: The Witch In The Woods Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64-bit system
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Deep in the perilous Greywind Forest reside a mysterious witch. She is rumored to be evil and dangerous. Nellie has her own reason to enter the forest. When she encounters the witch, what will happen? This is a light yuri fantasy visual novel.
